mTriggerItems.description: Items that make this research available once it enters the players inventory

mIsRepeatable.description: Can this research be completed multiple times?

mUnlockedResearch.description: What research that will be unlocked in the research tree by completing this research

mUnlockedSchematics.description: What schematics that will be purchased by completing this research

mIncludeInBuilds.description: Slightly misleading name, as this doesn't only apply to builds. If set to Never, it won't show up in editor

mExcludeFromBuild_DEPRECATED.description: Old property for excluding from build, remove when all UFGResearchRecipe is resaved on main

mAssetBundleData.description: Asset Bundle data computed at save time. In cooked builds this is accessible from AssetRegistry

mDisplayNameOverride.description: If we override the display name or get it from the first products item name.

mDisplayName.description: Overridden name for this recipe, if mDisplayNameOverride is false the first product's item name is used.

mIngredients.description: Ingredients needed to produce the products.

mProduct.description: The products produced from this recipe.

mManufactoringDuration.description: The time it takes to produce the output.

mManualManufacturingMultiplier.description: The time it takes to produce the output.

mProducedIn.description: Defines where this recipe can be produced
